sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0440 ( DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , PAYR_ITEM_CD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , UCST_SUM , UCST_CALC_DIV_CD , UCST_PRNT_ORD , UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , UCST_DGM_END_DT , UCST_DGM_USE_YN , UCST_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #payYr# , #pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# , #typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , #payrItemSeilNum# , #occuClssPayCmpttnStd# , #payrItemCd# , #payrMangDeptCd# , #ucstSum# , #ucstCalcDivCd# , #ucstPrntOrd# , #ucstDgmBgnnDt# , #ucstDgmEndDt# , #ucstDgmUseYn# , #ucstNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0440 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , PAY_YR=#payYr# , PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# , PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum# , PAYR_ITEM_CD=#payrItemCd# , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd# , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd# , UCST_SUM=#ucstSum# , UCST_CALC_DIV_CD=#ucstCalcDivCd# , UCST_PRNT_ORD=#ucstPrntOrd# , UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT=#ucstDgmBgnnDt# , UCST_DGM_END_DT=#ucstDgmEndDt# , UCST_DGM_USE_YN=#ucstDgmUseYn# , UCST_NOTE_CTNT=#ucstNoteCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum# AND OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM PAYR0440 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , PAYR_ITEM_CD , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , UCST_SUM , UCST_CALC_DIV_CD , UCST_PRNT_ORD , UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , UCST_DGM_END_DT , UCST_DGM_USE_YN , UCST_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0440 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND PAY_YR=#payYr# AND PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD=#pyspLogSvcYrNumCd# AND TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM=#typOccuGrdeMppgSeilNum# AND OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD=#occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM=#payrItemSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , CC.PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PAY_CD) AS payCdcommCdNm , CC.PAY_CD AS payCdcommCd , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCdNm , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , (CC.PAYR_IMCD) AS PAY_ITEM_CD , CC.ITEM_NM AS PAYR_ITEM_NM , CC.ITEM_NM AS PAY_ITEM_NM , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.PAY_YR , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , AA.UCST_SUM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS UCST_CALC_DIV_NM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCd ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCdNm , AA.UCST_PRNT_ORD , AA.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_END_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_USE_YN , AA.UCST_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0440 AA, PAYR0400 BB, PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_CD = CC.PAYR_IMCD
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD = #pyspLogSvcYrNumCd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.PAY_YR DESC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ASC , CC.PAY_CD , CC.PAYR_IMCD , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , CC.PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PAY_CD) AS payCdcommCdNm , CC.PAY_CD AS payCdcommCd , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCdNm , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , (CC.PAYR_IMCD) AS PAY_ITEM_CD , CC.ITEM_NM , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.PAY_YR , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , AA.UCST_SUM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS UCST_CALC_DIV_NM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCd ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCdNm , AA.UCST_PRNT_ORD , AA.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_END_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_USE_YN , AA.UCST_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0440 AA, PAYR0400 BB, PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_CD = CC.PAYR_IMCD
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD = #pyspLogSvcYrNumCd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.PAY_YR , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0440 AA , PAYR0400 BB, PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_CD = CC.PAYR_IMCD
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.PAY_YR DESC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD DESC , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.PAY_YR , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0440 AA , PAYR0400 BB, PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_CD = CC.PAYR_IMCD
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , CC.PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PAY_CD) AS payCdcommCdNm , CC.PAY_CD AS payCdcommCd , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCdNm , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , (CC.PAYR_IMCD) AS PAY_ITEM_CD , CC.ITEM_NM AS PAY_ITEM_NM , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.PAY_YR , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , AA.UCST_SUM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS UCST_CALC_DIV_NM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCd ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCdNm , AA.UCST_PRNT_ORD , AA.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_END_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_USE_YN , AA.UCST_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0440 AA, PAYR0400 BB, PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_CD = CC.PAYR_IMCD
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC , AA.PAY_YR DESC , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD ASC , CC.PAY_CD , CC.PAYR_IMCD , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM ASC , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM , AA.PAYR_ITEM_SEIL_NUM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , CC.PAY_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,CC.PAY_CD) AS payCdcommCdNm , CC.PAY_CD AS payCdcommCd , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.PYSP_LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD) AS pyspLogSvcYrNumCdcommCdNm , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD) AS PYSP_GRDE_NM , (CC.PAYR_IMCD) AS PAY_ITEM_CD , CC.ITEM_NM , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , AA.PAY_YR , AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , AA.UCST_SUM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS UCST_CALC_DIV_NM , AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCd ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.UCST_CALC_DIV_CD) AS ucstCalcDivCdcommCdNm , AA.UCST_PRNT_ORD , AA.UCST_DGM_BGNN_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_END_DT , AA.UCST_DGM_USE_YN , AA.UCST_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD , (SELECT PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM BASS0150 WHERE BASS0150.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD = AA.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD) AS PAY_MANGE_DEPT_NM FROM PAYR0440 AA, PAYR0400 BB, PAYR0410 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = BB.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.PAY_YR = CC.PAY_YR AND AA.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM = CC.TYP_OCCU_GRDE_MPPG_SEIL_NUM AND AA.PAYR_ITEM_CD = CC.PAYR_IMCD
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.PAY_YR=#payYr#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD = #occuClssPayCmpttnStd#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DPOB_CD , PAY_YR , (PAY_YR) AS PAY_YR_DISP FROM PAYR0440 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , PAY_YR DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DPOB_CD , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY.MM.DD')) AS OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD_DISP FROM PAYR0440 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT DISTINCT DPOB_CD , OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD , (OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD) AS OCCU_CLSS_PAY_CMPTTN_STD_DISP FROM PAYR0440 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
PAY_YR=#payYr#
)
